BitStreamReader¶

class zserio.BitStreamReader(buffer)[source]¶

Bases: object

Bit stream reader.

Constructs bit stream reader from bytes buffer.

Parameters:buffer – Bytes-like buffer to read as a bit stream.

Methods Summary

alignTo(alignment) Aligns the bit position according to the aligning value.
fromFile(filename) Constructs bit stream reader from file.
getBitPosition() Gets current bit position.
readBits(numBits) Reads given number of bits from the bit stream as an unsigned integer.
readBool() Reads single bit as a bool value.
readFloat16() Read 16-bits from the stream as a float value encoded according to IEEE 754 binary16.
readFloat32() Read 32-bits from the stream as a float value encoded according to IEEE 754 binary32.
readFloat64() Read 64-bits from the stream as a float value encoded according to IEEE 754 binary64.
readSignedBits(numBits) Reads given number of bits from the bit stream as a signed integer.
readString() Reads string from the stream.
readVarInt() Reads variable signed integer value (up to 9 bytes) from the bit stream.
readVarInt16() Reads variable 16-bit signed integer value from the bit stream.
readVarInt32() Reads variable 32-bit signed integer value from the bit stream.
readVarInt64() Reads variable 64-bit signed integer value from the bit stream.
readVarUInt() Reads variable unsigned integer value (up to 9 bytes) from the bit stream.
readVarUInt16() Reads variable 16-bit unsigned integer value from the bit stream.
readVarUInt32() Reads variable 32-bit unsigned integer value from the bit stream.
readVarUInt64() Reads variable 64-bit unsigned integer value from the bit stream.
setBitPosition(bitPosition) Sets bit position.

Methods Documentation

alignTo(alignment)[source]¶

Aligns the bit position according to the aligning value.

Parameters:alignment – An aligning value to use.
Raises:PythonRuntimeException – If the aligning moves behind the stream.”
classmethod fromFile(filename)[source]¶

Constructs bit stream reader from file.

Parameters:filename – Filename to read as a bit stream.
getBitPosition()[source]¶

Gets current bit position.

Returns:Current bit position.
readBits(numBits)[source]¶

Reads given number of bits from the bit stream as an unsigned integer.

Parameters:numBits – Number of bits to read.
Returns:Read bits as an unsigned integer.
Raises:PythonRuntimeException – If the numBits is invalid number of the reading goes behind the stream.
readBool()[source]¶

Reads single bit as a bool value.

Returns:Read bool values.
Raises:PythonRuntimeException – If the reading goes behind the stream.
readFloat16()[source]¶

Read 16-bits from the stream as a float value encoded according to IEEE 754 binary16.

Returns:Read float value.
Raises:PythonRuntimeException – If the reading goes behind the stream.
readFloat32()[source]¶

Read 32-bits from the stream as a float value encoded according to IEEE 754 binary32.

Returns:Read float value.
Raises:PythonRuntimeException – If the reading goes behind the stream.
readFloat64()[source]¶

Read 64-bits from the stream as a float value encoded according to IEEE 754 binary64.

Returns:Read float value.
Raises:PythonRuntimeException – If the reading goes behind the stream.
readSignedBits(numBits)[source]¶

Reads given number of bits from the bit stream as a signed integer.

Parameters:numBits – Number of bits to read
Returns:Read bits as a signed integer.
Raises:PythonRuntimeException – If the numBits is invalid number of the reading goes behind the stream.
readString()[source]¶

Reads string from the stream.

Returns:Read string.
Raises:PythonRuntimeException – If the reading goes behind the stream.
readVarInt()[source]¶

Reads variable signed integer value (up to 9 bytes) from the bit stream.

Returns:Variable signed integer value (up to 9 bytes).

Reads variable 16-bit signed integer value from the bit stream.

Reads variable unsigned integer value (up to 9 bytes) from the bit stream.

readVarUInt64()[source]¶

Returns:Variable 64-bit unsigned integer value.
setBitPosition(bitPosition)[source]¶

Sets bit position.

Parameters:bitPosition – New bit position.
Raises:PythonRuntimeException – If the position is not within the stream.
